Title: Calcasieu Pass LNG shipments drop to a 10-month low in June, weighing on US LNG exports
Description: LNG exports from Venture Global’s 10 mtpa Calcasieu Pass LNG plant in Louisiana fell to a 10-month low in June, with the drop in shipments likely due to extensive repairs needed on the plant’s heat recovery steam generators.
Author: CK

Title: Spain’s El Musel LNG terminal receives a commissioning cargo from Calcasieu Pass
Description: The 5.1 mtpa El Musel LNG receiving terminal in Gijon, Spain, has received a cargo to test and commission the facility and prepare for the start of commercial operations.
Author: CK
